items.title: Apple: WWDC 2025 Was A Major Point Of Failure
items.description: Apple seems lost in a rapidly evolving market environment. Read how AAPL stock is struggling with long-term trends and repeated missteps like WWDC 2025.

items.title: Week in Review: WWDC 2025 recap
items.description: Welcome back to Week in Review! We have lots for you this week, including what came out of WWDC 2025; The Browser Company's AI browser; OpenAI's partnership with Mattel; and your iPad might finally be a true work machine.

items.title: The App Store’s new AI-generated tags are live in the beta
items.description: Apple’s plans to improve App Store discoverability using AI tagging techniques are now available in the developer beta build of iOS 26. However, the tags do not appear on the public App Store as of yet, nor are they informing the App Store Search algorithm on the public store. Of course, with any upcoming App […]
